body.directions: Listen to the audio and select the correct letter of the alphabet used in the audio. Practice as many times as you may need!

body.quiz: Based on the audio, with what letter does the word start?
body.correct: Terrific! This wasn't a sour practice for you.
body.incorrect: Almost! Review your note guide and try again.

body.quiz: Based on the audio, with what letter does the word start?
body.correct: Great job! You smashed this practice.
body.incorrect: You can do this! Review your note guide and try again.

body.quiz: Based on the audio, with what letter does the word start?
body.correct: Awesome! Ride your success until the last stop!
body.incorrect: Almost! Review your note guide and try again.

body.quiz: Based on the audio, with what letter does the word start?
body.incorrect: Don't let gravity pull you down. Try again!

body.quiz: Based on the audio, with what letter does the word start?
body.correct: Great job! No humps on the way.
body.incorrect: Almost there. Review your note guide and try again.
